title: Which will be best location preference for CTS fresher for better career and technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can only fill up your preferences for choosing the training centre of Cognizant.The major training centers of Cognizant in India are in Pune , Chennai and Kolkata.You will be onboarded to any of the training centers and will be trained on Technology depending on the requirement( you wont be having any chance to choose your training location and technology, it will all be managed internally). In Pune you can mainly find Banking and Finance domain.In Chennai its Lifescience and Healthcare Once you complete your training , you will be allocated to project depending on requirement in any location , it can be same as your training location or different.

I can't say particularly about CTS. But if you join in locations like Hyderabad or Pune, it'll be good for your career in long term. Because in this kind of locations you'll get ample opportunities to switch jobs and move ahead in your career. Second thing is these locations have cosmopolitan work culture which will make you comfortable. But if u want to stay close to ur hometown, u can always choose a city near that.
